data.title: Kissflow - Oversee, organize, and collaborate
data.meta_description: Oversee, organize, and collaborate. Discover the best deal for Kissflow on AppSumo today.
data.text:
Kissflow is a cloud-based workflow management solution that allows business users, IT leaders, and digital transformation experts to automate business processes and track performance.

Kissflow offers comprehensive workflow management solutions within its robust platform.

With Workflow Management, Kissflow allows you to optimize your business workflows using simple workflow management apps.

Its industry-leading no-code process builder allows you to create custom workflow apps to solve challenges and facilitate work for your team. You can create roles and choose access levels and role assignments for everyone involved in the workflow.

The Page Builder allows you to design web pages for your custom application. You can also use it to create custom navigation. This allows you to build the experience for users and personalize as needed.

Kissflow even lets you co-create with LCNC (low-code-no-code), which means using both low-code and no-code platforms, reducing friction and maximizing efficiency.

Kissflow’s Process Management capabilities allow for seamless automation of repetitive tasks across various departments.

For one, you won’t have to create workflows for each of your processes from scratch. Kissflow offers 400 of the most popular business process templates you can customize to build your own.

The template library includes processes such as vendor payment, service requests, purchase orders, employee onboarding, expense reimbursement, and helpdesk.

Know what the best part is? You won’t have to type a line of code. Even if you are building processes from scratch, you can easily build highly functional applications with the dynamic App Builder. Deploy pre-built apps and tailor them to your needs.

Kissflow also lets you enjoy an intuitive and powerful reporting dashboard. The dashboard enables you to visualize your workflows and aggregate data. This allows you to keep tabs on and measure the efficacy of processes across teams with built-in reports.

Using Kissflow’s Cash Management feature offers everything you need to manage, including ticketing, bug tracking, incident management, service requests, claim processing, helpdesk and more.

For each use case, Kissflow allows you to take full control of workflows, ensure a flexible approach to investigations, take corrective actions, and generate reports for analysis.

Key features
